thread.title: Premier visit to hotel and expo centre
thread.title_full: Premier visit to hotel and expo centre - Review of Hotel Paris Vaugirard, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: anthonygD2122LV
title: Premier visit to hotel and expo centre
text:
The reception staff were very friendly and helpful, allowing us to leave baggage before the check in time. Whilst the room was small it was tastefully decorated and modern; The room had a shower which again was modern and clean. The lift to the room only takes a maximum of 3 people but no difficulties were encountered. Whilst the hotel is quite small it is ideally situated for the paris expo centre. The hotel is also ideally located for several different restaurants and close to the metro and tram services. We could hear the metro from the room.
Room Tip: Metro noise See more room tips
